TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Afalian_Lufic, title = Afalian_Lufic, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afalian_Lufic} }

S.FORM: Masalipa:Infobox person O Afalian Lufic (Holam: 盧學叡;Ikilis: Afalean Lu; 1988 a miheca saka 2 a folad saka 15 a romi'ad－ saka) cecay mianingaya ato romadiw a tamdaw i Taywan. Taypak suli Nan'gang Kawcung a mico^yap, ca Ciyukok Unhwa Daigak sowal no France Bungak hi' ato Taypak suli Ondo Gaku'in a mico^yap. Na u micamol to malalifet Cawcisingkwangtataw i Pipahosoan to tilifi no Ciyukok .

Masalipa:Infobox person O Afalian Lofic (Holam: 盧學叡;Ikilis: Afalean Lo; 1988 a miheca saka 2 a folad saka 15 a romi'ad－ saka) cecay mianingaya ato romadiw a tamdaw i Taywan. Taypak soli Nan'gang Kawcong a mico^yap, ca Ciyokok Unhwa Daigak sowal no France Bongak hi' ato Taypak soli Ondo Gako'in a mico^yap. Na o micamol to malalifet Cawcisingkwangtataw i Pipahosoan to tilifi no Ciyokok .
